thread.title: Noser Engineering AG Announces Strategic Partnership with Dr. W.A. Günther Audio Systems AG
thread.title_full: Noser Engineering AG Announces Strategic Partnership with Dr. W.A. Günther Audio Systems AG

title: Noser Engineering AG Announces Strategic Partnership with Dr. W.A. Günther Audio Systems AG
text:
Noser Engineering AG Announces Strategic Partnership with Dr. W.A. Günther Audio Systems AG 
WINTERTHUR , Switzerland , September 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- 
Noser Engineering AG the Swiss based global information technology consultancy announced its partnership with Dr. W.A. Günther Audio Systems AG today. The partnership leverages combined strengths in professional software development and professional audio and video technology positioning both companies well to compete within the ever-advancing smart entertainment systems market. 
Dr. W.A. Günther Audio Systems is a leading distributor of premium audio and video technology brands and a leading provider of professional audio, video and system solutions . 
"In this rapidly evolving digital age, it was critical that we find an innovative software development partner that meets our requirements for highly complex audio and video systems and understands the various standards with the capacity to develop them even further" said Christoph Pfister , CTO at Dr. W.A. Günther Audio Systems. 
"With over 30 years of experience, the co-development of complex software solutions and architectures such as Android™ , developing the world's first production ready Android based infotainment system and other innovations, Noser Engineering delivers the required expertise" 
"We are excited by the partnership with Dr. W.A. Günther Audio Systems and look forward to jointly bringing innovative next generation solutions to market" said Beat Zollinger, COO of Noser Engineering . 
About Dr. W. A. Günther Audio Systems AG: 
Dr. W.A. Günther Audio Systems AG is a leading distributor of premium audio and video technology brands and a leading provider of professional audio, video and system solutions. Dr. W.A. Günther Audio Systems AG analyzes trends and develops these further to maintain and strengthen this market position and guarantee optimal benefit for customers. Dr. W.A. Günther Audio Systems AG belongs to the Günther-Group which operates in Switzerland , Germany , Austria , Belgium and the Netherlands with around 160 employees. For more information, please visit: http://www.drwaguenther.ch 
Contact: Dr. W.A. Günther Audio Systems AG Dominic Beurer Tel.: +41-(0)43-222-30-39 
About Noser Engineering AG: 
Noser Engineering is a market-leading software engineering provider headquartered in Switzerland . With 170 employees, Noser Engineering has provided tailored solutions for over 30 years to Fortune 500, local, European and multinational companies. Noser Engineering is a founding member of the Open Handset Alliance (Android), award winning Microsoft ALM consultancy, and recipient of the European Foundation for Quality Management (EFQM) "Recognized for Excellence 5 Star" in 2014. Experts in embedded solutions and market leader in Swiss System Testing/QA . Noser Engineering provides IT know-how from consulting and brain sourcing through to solutions and complete projects . Noser Engineering are members of the Noser Group of companies. For more information, please visit: http://www.noser.com .
